name: Block Pooper 9
description: Ride a high velocity stream of blocky effluence to glory in this local multiplayer brawler.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 display aspect ratio
